welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Piracaia, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sao Jose Dos Campos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sao Jose Dos Campos Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guarulhos Airport, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal at Guarulhos Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow or unreliable.
